description:
We are trial lawyers who represent injured individuals and businesses in Colorado and Wyoming. It is our job to tell your story-an art that we constantly work to perfect. Most importantly, we fight to make sure you're compensated for your injuries. Call us today!

Attorney Sean Olson founded our Denver law office, The Olson Law Firm, in order to provide a wide range of high-quality legal services to individuals and businesses from the Denver metropolitan area, and the nearby counties in both Colorado and Wyoming. Since the founding of our firm, clients have regularly turned to us for assistance as they work to find solutions to legal problems that have arisen in the following areas:

  • Personal injury
  • Civil litigation

Mr. Olson founded our law firm based on the belief that all clients deserve professional, ethical and honest representation, regardless of their legal needs. By making these principles the basis of all that he does, he has built a reputation as a dedicated client advocate and consummate professional.

Whether you are an individual, a small business owner or a corporate leader and regardless of the legal challenge you face, you can look to The Olson Law Firm for assistance with even the most complex legal matters. If you would like to discuss your legal need with our experienced attorney, you can take advantage of our firm's offer for a free initial consultation at our Denver law office.
